name: Mino Mino Friendship Simulator
description:
Welcome to Mino Mino Academy! Here, you can learn all the important things, like math, literature, how to spy on people through bushes, how to navigate illegal boxing rings, and most importantly, how to make friends! The academy is filled with many diverse students- all of which you can befriend and get to know personally in your first week of school.

Game includes-

  • At least 12 classes!
  • 15 different characters!
  • Befriend boys, girls, nonbinary people, ghosts, cats, demons, trees, a closet, and a horse!
  • Minigames!
  • And so much more!

Mino Mino Friendship Simulator is currently in development.
Soundtrack was made using Wolfram Tones random generator and edited using Audacity.
Art is being created/proper models are being implemented.
Minigames are being created.
